issues.description: Problem statement specifies that SealSaloon.orders should be a List<Meal>, but the solution uses a Meal[] array for orders. This mismatch in the attribute type may confuse students on whether to use java.util.List or an array with ArrayHelpers.
issues.suggested_fix: Either update the problem statement to specify orders as a Meal[] array (to match ArrayHelpers usage) or change the solution (and template guidance) to use List<Meal> (e.g., ArrayList<Meal>) consistently.
